#Text=CanadaVOTES : Liberal Sandra Gardiner running in Perth — Wellington
#Text=Friday , September 26 , 2008
#Text=On October 14 , 2008 , Canadians will be heading to the polls for the federal election .
#Text=Liberal Party candidate Sandra Gardiner is standing for election in the riding of Perth — Wellington .
#Text=A Stratford resident for the last 17 years , she has worked as a Registered Nurse for the last 14 , in hospital , long term , and community care settings .

#Text=She is a member of Registered Nurses Association of Ontario , Canadian Association of Physicians concerned about the Environment , FarmGate5 , Common Action for the Restoration of the Environment , Autism Ontario , the Planning Committee for Rotary Respite House , and board member of Optimism Place , the local women 's shelter .
#Text=Wikinews contacted Sandra , to talk about the issues facing Canadians , and what they and their party would do to address them .
#Text=Wikinews is in the process of contacting every candidate , in every riding across the country , no matter their political stripe .
#Text=All interviews are conducted over e-mail , and interviews are published unedited , allowing candidates to impart their full message to our readers , uninterrupted .
#Text=The riding is currently held by Conservative Gary Schellenberger , who was also MP for the previous riding , Perth — Middlesex .
#Text=Perth — Wellington includes the County of Perth , and the Town of Minto and the townships of Mapleton and Wellington North in the County of Wellington .
#Text=Also challenging Schellenberger are John Cowling ( Green ) , Irma DeVries ( Christian Heritage ) , Julian Ichim ( Marxist-Leninist ) , and Kerry McManus ( NDP ) .
#Text=For more information , visit the campaign 's official website , listed below .
#Text=Interview
#Text=Why are you running for political office , why at the federal level , why this party , and why in this riding ?
#Text=I am running for office because I care about Canada and my fellow Canadians .
#Text=I am worried about the future we are leaving behind to our children .
#Text=I am running for Member of Parliament because it is Canada ? s top level of government that carries the responsibility of overseeing which path we take in dealing with the following issues :
#Text=the direction we chose for our Economy and ensure it stays on course ; the way we chose to deal with the Environment ; protection of our Universal Health Care System and many other issues .
#Text=The Federal Government sets the tone for the rest of the Country to follow .
#Text=I want to be a part of how we shape the future .
#Text=The Liberal Party of Canada has come to match my values best .

#Text=I support our plans addressing the following issues Economy , Environment , Healthcare , Poverty Reduction , continued support for our Arts and Culture Community , our policy on immigration and our role Internationally .
#Text=I have just touched on just a few of the reasons I have come to embrace the ideas of the Liberal Party of Canada .
#Text=I am running in this riding because I have been a resident here for almost 20 years .
#Text=As a result I have first hand experience with some of the issues here locally .
#Text=I am passionate about my community .
